title: Bug: calling getPayload multiple times
body:
The last time a block was produced I got the following logs:

```
- level=debug msg=getPayload method=getPayload version=v1.5.0
- level=debug msg="calling getPayload" ...
- level=info msg="received payload from relay"
- level=info msg="http: POST /eth/v1/builder/blinded_blocks 200"
- level=debug msg=getPayload method=getPayload version=v1.5.0
- level=debug msg="calling getPayload"
- level=warning msg="error making request to relay, retrying" blockHash=x error="HTTP error response: 400 / {\"code\":400,\"message\":\"payload for this slot was already delivered\"}\n" method=getPayload
- level=warning msg="error making request to relay, retrying" blockHash=x error="HTTP error response: 400 / {\"code\":400,\"message\":\"payload for this slot was already delivered\"}\n" method=getPayload
- level=warning msg="error making request to relay, retrying" blockHash=x error="HTTP error response: 400 / {\"code\":400,\"message\":\"payload for this slot was already delivered\"}\n" method=getPayload
- level=warning msg="error making request to relay, retrying" blockHash=x error="HTTP error response: 400 / {\"code\":400,\"message\":\"payload for this slot was already delivered\"}\n" method=getPayload
- level=warning msg="error making request to relay, retrying" blockHash=x error="HTTP error response: 400 / {\"code\":400,\"message\":\"payload for this slot was already delivered\"}\n" method=getPayload
- level=error msg="error making request to relay" blockHash=x error="request context error after 6 attempts: context deadline exceeded" method=getPayload parentHash=x url="https://relay.ultrasound.money/eth/v1/builder/blinded_blocks" version=v1.5.0
- level=error msg="no payload received from relay!" \
- level=info msg="http: POST /eth/v1/builder/blinded_blocks 502
```

Omitted some information, and can share more in private via request.

- Payload was received, the block was proposed successfully and was not orphaned.
